title: Dance Selector

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "next" on one switch and "dance!" on the other.
• Play some music and have the dancers sit on chairs in a row in front of the switch user.
• The person sitting in the first (left-most) chair stands up.
• If the switch user presses "next," that person sits down and the person in the next chair stands up.
• If the switch user presses "dance!", whoever is currently standing must show off their best dance moves for 10 seconds.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to scan through at least 3 people willing to dance. Whoever is chosen must strut their stuff!
